title: Solution Architect, DevSecOps Engineer
responsibilities: Implement a governance review program with delivery teams
Implement a governance report for leadership
Design and build a custom solution to host GitHub actions runners within our cloud environments
Build standardized actions for GitHub Actions to create a paved-path for delivery teams’ workflows
Start an “Office Hours” program to offer dedicated time to answering questions or assisting in troubleshooting
Lead the development of infrastructure for AI centric applications

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
responsibilities: Design, build CI/CD pipeline with github actions, terraform, AWS CodeDeploy
Automate infrastructure scaling for live events (AWS Step Functions, TypeScript, NodeJs, NestJs)
Develop the public API with GraphQL (AWS AppSync, TypeScript, NodeJs)
Develop microservices based on domain driven design to break down a monolith (Serverless, ECS Fargate + Docker, TypeScript, NodeJs)
Research, design, and document services and how to best fit in AWS ecosystem

title: Software Engineer II
responsibilities: Build a service to support active/active encoding of live streams
Build a service to automate clipping of replays for live events
Build a service to add trickplay for replays and VoDs
Build an SDK for the Live API
Plan and build out endpoints using Serverless, AWS Lambda
Plan and build out Serverless plugins to support API deployment
Build test framework to test endpoints, IoT messages, and SNS messages
Write supporting documentation in swagger and github

title: Software Developer II (Java)
responsibilities: Research and develop new features
Write technical overviews and outlines for new features
Maintain and build report delivery feature

title: Client Integration Engineer – Technical Lead
responsibilities: Lead new client integration and requirements gathering to meet client goals
Write and test custom scripts using Javascript to run countdowns, table look ups, and data gathering
Create stored SQL procedures to read product feeds and create/update look up tables
Project manager to develop a tool to automate look up table updates and notifications (Python, PostgreSQL)
Develop web service APIs to gather data about a given client's set up or modify a given client's configuration for internal tools (PHP, PostgreSQL)
Create web interface to work with web service APIs (Javascript, JQuery, Datatables)
Develop an internal tool to monitor hourly performance of running messages (Python, PostgreSQL)
Develop an internal tool to send snapshots of database tables to show what images are stored in the table and the related copy (PHP, Javascript, PostgreSQL)
Develop a Chrome extension to display Dotomi registration data and messages in a sidebar to help with tag and message testing and debugging (Javascript)
